New Developments in Cardiac Arrest Management - PMC: To achieve ROSC, early CPR and defibrillation are critical for survival when a shockable rhythm is encountered. Cardiac arrest - Wikipedia: Sudden cardiac arrest may be treated via attempts at resuscitation. This is usually carried out based on basic life support, advanced cardiac life support (ACLS), pediatric advanced life support (PALS), or neonatal resuscitation program (NRP) guidelines. [en.wikipedia.org]
